sys_ui_policy.script_false: function onCondition() { var fields = { 'proband_last_name': true, 'proband_first_name': true, 'proband_middle_name': true, 'proband_maiden_name': true, 'proband_address': true, 'proband_city': true, 'proband_state': true, 'proband_zipcode': true, 'proband_home_phone': true, 'proband_office_phone': true, 'proxy_last_name': true, 'proxy_first_name': true, 'proxy_middle_name': true, 'proxy_maiden_name': true, 'proxy_address': true, 'proxy_city': true, 'proxy_state': true, 'proxy_zipcode': true, 'proxy_home_phone': true, 'proxy_office_phone': true, }; for (var key in fields) { g_form.setDisplay(key, fields[key]); } }
sys_ui_policy.script_true: function onCondition() { var fields = { 'proband_last_name': true, 'proband_first_name': true, 'proband_middle_name': true, 'proband_maiden_name': true, 'proband_address': true, 'proband_city': true, 'proband_state': true, 'proband_zipcode': true, 'proband_home_phone': true, 'proband_office_phone': true, 'proxy_last_name': false, 'proxy_first_name': false, 'proxy_middle_name': false, 'proxy_maiden_name': false, 'proxy_address': false, 'proxy_city': false, 'proxy_state': false, 'proxy_zipcode': false, 'proxy_home_phone': false, 'proxy_office_phone': false, }; for (var key in fields) { g_form.setDisplay(key, fields[key]); } }
sys_ui_policy.short_description: Determine when to show Proband information or Proxy information
sys_ui_policy.sys_name: Determine when to show Proband information or Proxy information
